text: Slim Dusty has released 120 records (101 studio albums) in his career. He has sold more than seven million records and earned over 70 gold and platinum album certifications. NB: Chart positions prior to 1970 are unknown. Certifications prior to 1997 are unknown. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:20em;" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:20em;" | Album details !
